original_text: All these were of costly stones, according to the measures of hewed stones, sawed with saws, within and without, even from the foundation unto the coping, and so on the outside toward the great court.
korean_text: 이 집들은 안팎을 모두 귀하고 다듬은 돌로 지었으니 크기대로 톱으로 켠 것이라 그 초석에서 처마까지와 외면에서 큰 뜰에 이르기까지 다 그러하니

sentences.original_text: All these were of costly stones
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것은 귀한 돌로 만들어졌으며

sentences.original_text: according to the measures of hewed stones
even from the foundation unto the coping
and so on the outside toward the great court
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 뜰을 향한 바깥쪽에도 그러하였더라
